LanguageData.WallUtilities.Report.NoRoof: Space in front of heater must be under a roof.
LanguageData.WallUtilities.Report.FreeSpace: Space in front of heater must not be a wall, door, or other heater.
LanguageData.WallUtilities.Report.ByWall: Must be placed next to wall.
LanguageData.WallUtilities.Report.OnFence: Must be placed along a fence.
LanguageData.WallUtilities.Report.OnWall: Must be placed on a wall and facing a clear space.
